org.fujion.ancillary

Interface IEnumWithValue

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IClientTransform
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttachmentParameterType, AttachmentPoint, BlendFactor, BlendMode, BufferBinding, BufferBitMask, BufferParameterType, BufferUsagePattern, Capability, ColorFormat, ContextParameterType, DepthFunction, DrawMode, ErrorType, FaceMode, FeedbackBufferMode, FrameBufferBinding, FrameBufferStatus, HintBehavior, HintMode, PixelDataType, PixelFormat, PixelStorageParameter, PrecisionType, ProgramParameterType, RenderBufferBinding, RenderBufferInternalFormat, RenderBufferParameterType, ShaderParameterType, ShaderType, StencilFunction, TextureBufferInternalFormat, TextureFormat, TextureParameterType, TextureType, TextureType2, TiltAngle, ValueType, VertexAttributeOffsetType, VertexAttributeType, WindingMode

    public interface IEnumWithValue
extends IClientTransform
    Implemented by enums that have an associated integer value. This value is to be used when passed in a client invocation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T extends Enum<T>>
      T      		 fromValue(Class<T> enm, int value)
      Looks up an enumeration constant given its numeric value.
      default Integer transformForClient()
      Transform to integer value for client invocation.
      int value()
      Returns the value associated with an enum element.

      • fromValue

        static <T extends Enum<T>> T fromValue(Class<T> enm,
                                       int value)
        Looks up an enumeration constant given its numeric value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The enum class.
        Parameters:
        enm - The enum class.
        value - The numeric value to find.
        Returns:
        The enumeration constant sought, or null if none found.
